title: The Magic Apple
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Australian
description: A wholefoods restaurant that offers an extensive menu of salads, hot entrees, wraps, a range of cakes and cookies. Sample items such as scrambled tofu, bruschetta, macadamia nut butter on toast, vegan nachos, dahl, and chickpea curry. Has free Wi-Fi and occasional live music.
